sentences: Emi Shinohara (篠原 恵美, Shinohara Emi, born Emiko Shinohara (篠原  恵美子, Shinohara Emiko), born August 8, 1963) is a Japanese voice actress and singer employed by 81 Produce who is most known for voicing Sailor Jupiter in the original Japanese anime of Sailor Moon and Kushina Uzumaki in Naruto: Shippuden.
She was born in Fukushima Prefecture and raised in Nagano.
She is married to tokusatsu actor Hiroshi Watari.
